answers.answer: Hi,Check your blood and urine for sugar.If you are a known diabetic consult your diabetologist .Your condition could be 'Peripheral Neuritis' a condition caused by diabetes.Please check your thyroid levels ,low levels of thyroid harmone can cause the same symptom.Keep a check on your alcohol intake if you are in the habit of consuming alcohol ,since it can cause tingling of foot too.Goodluck

Thanks! I've been treated for for a hypothyroid condition for most of 2007, my thyroid levels recently came down to normal, but I still have tingling. My last blood labs in April didn't indicate diabetes. I rarely drink alcohol. Neuro MD is at a loss to the cause. I just changed my mattress to see if that helps, so far no improvement. No one seems to be able figure out this tingling.

i have tingling in my mid left back and finger tips. sometimes a pain is situated in my left lower ribs. if i touch the inside of my left elbow, i have a sensation in my left hand and mid left back, just under my shoulder blade. the tingling itself is not painful, just uncomfortable. the main area of pain is in my lower left ribs. i tend to apply pressure to them to ease the pain.any suggestions??

Hi, some of the other causes for tingling are low calcium and vitamin B levels in blood, did blood investigations suggested any of these deficiencies? You can try calcium and vitamin B preparations for a month or so.

question: For about a year I've had tingling in my feet, more in left foot than right. I also have some tingling in my back in the left, mid back, also sometimes in my left inner thigh and on occasion in upper chest. But, mostly it's my feet tingling on and off thoughout thday and night, especially left. I've had both  brain and  spine MRIs that were normal, MD said no disc problems, no pinched nerves! I do NOT have weakness or numbness, etc. (I've had carpal tunnel in the past due to thyorid, that's ok now). Any idea what might cause this tingling? I've wondered of sitting at computer all day or sleeping in the wrong position might do this??? I'm 40 and normal weight.
title: Tingling sensations - feet, back, thigh
